name: ClipDrop
description:
Use the most advanced image processing tools from ClipDrop directly in Figma:

  • Remove the background with incredible accuracy
  • Remove objects, people, text or defects
  • Enhance images and magically increase the resolution
  • Remove noise & compression artefacts in 1 click


Use for Free:

  • No limits on the number of images.
  • No subscription is required.


How it works:

  • Run ClipDrop from the plugins menu.
  • Sign in with a free or ClipDrop Pro account
  • Select 1 or multiple images from your document.
  • Click on the action you want to perform "Remove background", "Decompose", "Cleanup" or "Upscale"
  • Et voil√†! :)


You can also use your ClipDrop account on:

  • ClipDrop iOS app
  • ClipDrop Android app
  • ClipDrop Web app


For advanced workflows, there's also an API, that lets you integrate ClipDrop anywhere.
